item.description:
If you enjoy The Secret, join us to check out "BEYOND THE SECRET" next Thursday night
Movie Time: 8 - 10 pm
Theatre: AMC Burlington 10
Buy ticket online ASAP:
http://www.movieticke...
Place: 20 South Ave. Burlington, MA 01803

If you can't join us in Burlington. find out about other participating theatres:
http://www.fathomeven...

DINING OUT BEFORE THE MOVIES - OPTIONAL:
Time: 6 - 7:15 pm
Restaurant: Romano's Macaroni Grill, Burlington, MA
(Menu price ranges $10 - $16)
Place: 50 South Avenue, Burlington, MA 01803-4904
http://www.macaronigr...

TAKE ACTION with "Beyond The Secret" Info:
Whether you've seen the movie or not, come join us!

Date: Saturday, 1/17
Time: 3 - 5 pm
Place: Dave's Loft, South Boston, MA
RSVP "YES" here:
http://lawofattractio...


====================
DETAILS OF EVENT:
Fathom and Anthem Pictures present BEYOND THE SECRET, a one-night event in select movie theatres nationwide on Thursday, January 15th.

This Fathom exclusive—Beyond the Secret—will be led by Larry King, host of CNN's Larry King Live.

Join an exclusive panel of motivational experts including Bob Proctor, Marcia Wieder, Christian Simpson, Les Brown, Holli Walker, Mark Moffitt, Paul Martinelli and Steve Siebold as they discuss life Beyond the Secret.

- These motivational experts will demonstrate how to apply the concepts from Beyond The Secret in real, tangible ways – including how to handle today’s turbulent economy and specific ways to improve your own life despite our nation’s financial setbacks.

- The discussion will then be opened to the audience for an exclusive panel discussion covering topics from wealth to faith and everything in between.

This magical evening will include awe-inspiring vignettes from the Beyond the Secret DVD and comes just in time for charting a new course for success in 2009 and beyond. Renew your commitment to making “the law of attraction” work for you. There’s no better time than the New Year to realize your full potential, and this inspirational, informational event is sure to be life changing.

Captured LIVE the previous evening.

Don’t miss Fathom’s Beyond the Secret – an unprecedented, unscripted event.
item.how_to_find_us: In front of Games Room area, left side

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: See YOU at the Movies: "BEYOND THE SECRET" - One Night Event
